name: Super Nova Party
description:
Nova's going super!

Compete online against 3 of your friends in this party game among the stars!
To win you'll need to collect the most escape pods before Nova implodes the galaxy! But how do you collect these pods?

  • Soar your ship through multiple spirals of the galaxy to reach the planet at the end and rescue their pods
  • Play chaotic free-for-all battles and intense 1v1 duels to make a comeback or further your lead
  • Use movement cards to try and land on the perfect board space

Super Nova Party is currently in an alpha version and will continue to receive updates.[/b]
In it's current version, Super Nova Party requires a full party of 4 to play and does not support split-screen.
There is currently only one minigame for the duels and battles, but more are planned!
